WHATIS(1) User Commands WHATIS(1)

NAME

whatis - display a one-line summary about a keyword

SYNOPSIS

whatis command  ...

DESCRIPTION

The whatis utility searches the manual index database for one-line summaries about any of the given commands. It is the same as the man command with the -f option.

SEE ALSO

man(1)
